{"id":1002475448,"question_id":2893,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690189049,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1002475448/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Visit Array Positions to Maximize Score","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maxScore(int[] nums, int x) {\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        long[][] dp = new long[len][2];\n        \n        if(nums[0]%2==0){\n            dp[0][0] = nums[0];    \n        }else{\n            dp[0][1] = nums[0];\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            \n            dp[i][0] = dp[i-1][0];\n            dp[i][1] = dp[i-1][1];\n            \n            if(nums[i]%2==0){\n                dp[i][0] = Math.max(dp[i][0], dp[i-1][0]+nums[i]);\n                dp[i][0] = Math.max(dp[i][0], dp[i-1][1]+nums[i]-x);\n            }else{\n                dp[i][1] = Math.max(dp[i][1], dp[i-1][1]+nums[i]);\n                dp[i][1] = Math.max(dp[i][1], dp[i-1][0]+nums[i]-x);\n            }\n            \n        }\n                                                 \n\n        return Math.max(dp[len-1][0], dp[len-1][1]);\n        \n       \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"visit-array-positions-to-maximize-score","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
